verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) Rescue <S%H2502><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%> men; <S%H376><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from violent <S%H2555><s%> men, <S%H120><s%>
Who <S%H834><s%> devise <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> things <S%H7451><s%> in [their] hearts; <S%H3820><s%> They continually <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> stir <S%H9075><s%> up wars. <S%H4421><s%>
They sharpen <S%H8150><s%> their tongues <S%H3956><s%> as a serpent; <S%H5175><s%> Poison <S%H2534><s%> of a viper <S%H5919><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> their lips. <S%H8193><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from violent <S%H2555><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> have purposed <S%H2803><s%> to trip <S%H1760><s%> up my feet. <S%H6471><s%>

The proud <S%H1343><s%> have hidden <S%H2934><s%> a trap <S%H6341><s%> for me, and cords; <S%H9112><s%> They have spread <S%H6566><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> by the wayside; <S%H4570><s%> They have set <S%H7896><s%> snares <S%H4170><s%> for me. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Thou art my God; <S%H410><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> ear, <S%H238><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>

"O God <S%H3068><s%> the Lord, <S%H136><s%> the strength <S%H5797><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> Thou hast covered <S%H5526><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle. <S%H5402><s%>

"Do not grant, <S%H5414><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the desires <S%H3970><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> Do not promote <S%H6329><s%> his [evil] device, <S%H2162><s%> [lest] they be exalted. <S%H7311><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"As for the head <S%H7218><s%> of those who surround <S%H5437><s%> me, May the mischief <S%H5999><s%> of their lips <S%H8193><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> them.

"May burning <S%H784><s%> coals <S%H1513><s%> fall <S%H4131><s%> upon them; May they be cast <S%H5307><s%> into the fire, <S%H784><s%> Into deep <S%H4113><s%> pits <S%H4113><s%> from which they cannot <S%H1077><s%> rise. <S%H6965><s%>

"May a slanderer <S%H376><s%> <S%H3956><s%> not be established <S%H3559><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> May evil <S%H9563><s%> hunt <S%H6679><s%> the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%> speedily. <S%H4073><s%>"
I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will maintain <S%H6213><s%> the cause <S%H1779><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6031><s%> And justice <S%H4941><s%> for the poor. <S%H34><s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy name; <S%H8034><s%> The upright <S%H3477><s%> will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Thy presence. <S%H6440><s%>
